name: I Love Zombie Smasher
description:
Download I Love Zombie Smasher and Play our new "FREE" game in Action Category on Android Google Play!

I love Zombie Smasher is a fun packed action game with lots of zombie invaders with new concept and twist. There's a Zombie Tsunami invading the town! Stop the Zombie and monsters from entering your area. Use your weapon to crush hordes of zombie. You need to be quick, Reckless and real fast. You have three lives to survive. Earn money to upgrade weapons. Complete the target assigned to reach next level. If you love zombie smashing games like Zombie Highway, then you will love this game.

GAME FEATURES:-

- 100% free gameplay.
- Kill different kinds of zombies.
- New Turbo weapons to upgrade.
- Easy and smooth controls.
- Excellent HD Graphics and Ultra thunder sound and backgrounds.
- Optimized for all models of Android smart phones
- Google Play Game Services integrated for leader boards and achievements.
- UNLOCK new achievements to challenge your friends on Google Play.
- Share on Facebook and Google Plus.

So what are you waiting for? Get ready for action game!

How to Play:-

Tap your phone/tablet to smash zombie.
Tap on the bomb to use.
